author: Nick Statt
title: Hey Robot, the genius game that tests your smart speaker, is now free on the web
description: Hey Robot, a new board game currently in production, now has a free digital version available on the web, courtesy of designer Frank Lantz’s company Everybody House Games. They wanted to put together a version people could play over video chat due to stay-at-…
content:
Play over video chat with friends
Photo: Everybody House Games
Hey Robot, the immensely clever board game from designer Frank Lantzs Everybody House Games, now has a free digital version on the web for anyone to play. Lantz says he and his collaborators, wh… [+1744 chars]
